mapper.insert: insert into receive (receivecode, receivedate, sortation, quantity, material, warehousecode, ordercode, productcode) values (#{receivecode},sysdate,#{sortation},#{quantity},#{material} ,#{warehousecode},#{ordercode},#{productcode})
mapper.select: select receivecode, receivedate, sortation, quantity, material, warehousecode, ordercode, productcode from receive
select receivecode, receivedate, sortation, quantity, material, warehousecode, ordercode, productcode from receive where receivecode = #{receivecode}
